title: What can we expect from Trump's SOTU?
shortDescription: Here is what can we expect from President Donald Trump's State of the Union address.

title: 'Very sad.' See what Trump said about former Prince Andrew's arrest
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said the arrest of the former prince  Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor was 'so bad for the royal family.' Why was he arrested?

title: Trump comments on Guthrie search
shortDescription: President Donald Trump told the media to "report on other subjects" as law enforcement searches for Nancy Guthrie in an ongoing investigation.

title: See government buildings where Trump has left his mark
shortDescription: Giant banners of the president and signs with his name have appeared on government buildings since his second term began in 2025.

title: 'Make America Safe Again': New Trump banner on DOJ building
shortDescription: A banner of President Trump was unfurled outside the Justice Department in the latest effort to stamp his identity on a Washington institution.

title: See huge Trump banner installed on Justice Department HQ
shortDescription: The banner, newly stretched across the Justice Department's DC headquarters, depicts a glaring Trump beside the phrase "Make America Safe Again."

title: Trump admin pledged refunds if Supreme Court overturned tariffs
shortDescription: Thousands of companies filed lawsuits demanding billions in refunds before the high court ruled on tariffs.

title: Trump visits Georgia as special election begins. Why it's important
shortDescription: The president visited Rome, Georgia where a special election is being held to replace Marjorie Taylor Greene who resigned in January.

title: SCOTUS rules against Trump tariffs
shortDescription: The Supreme Court ruled that President Donald Trump does not have the authority to impose sweeping tariffs at will.

title: How much could Californian households be owed due to Trump's tariffs?
shortDescription: The U.S. Supreme Court ruled on Feb. 20 that President Trump did not have the authority to impose sweeping tariffs. How much could Americans be owed?

title: Democrat secures Pete Buttigieg endorsement as Trump visits Georgia
shortDescription: Former Secretary of Transportation Pete Buttigieg announced his endorsement of Shawn Harris in the race to replace Marjorie Taylor Greene in Georgia.

title: Live updates: Angry Trump slams Supreme Court setback
shortDescription: President Trump's sweeping tariffs are the centerpiece of his economic agenda but have raised prices for businesses and consumers.

title: Trump kicks reporters out of meeting with governors: 'You can leave'
shortDescription: Trump kicked reporters out of his breakfast meeting with governors so the officials could have a 'candid' conversation.

title: Trump to order alien files released
shortDescription: President Donald Trump says he's ordering release of alien and UFO files after Barack Obama's comments sparked renewed interest.

title: Trump order prioritizes glyphosate under Defense Act
shortDescription: President Donald Trump signed an executive order prioritizing U.S. production of glyphosate, citing national security, food security and military needs.

title: ‘A lot of drama.’ What to expect at big Trump-governors White House showdown
shortDescription: Four-letter words. 'See you in court.' Why the annual bipartisan meeting of governors is getting increasingly political.

title: Trump declares glyphosate production a national defense priority
shortDescription: President Donald Trump in an executive order prioritized production of controversial herbicide glyphosate, subject of lawsuits linking it to cancer.

title: Trump on Fulton County raid during Georgia event
shortDescription: President Trump commented on the FBI seizure of ballots in Fulton County during a speech in Georgia.

title: Trump stumps in Georgia to replace his nemesis, says he 'solved' affordability
shortDescription: Trump arrived in Rome, in Georgia's 14th congressional district, ahead of the March 10 special election to replace Greene, who resigned from her seat.

title: Trump blasts Obama over alien remarks
shortDescription: Trump claims Obama disclosed classified information after remarks about aliens however, Obama later clarified he saw no evidence of aliens.

title: Trump says Iran has 10 days to reach deal over nuclear program
shortDescription: Trump said the world would know in 10 or 15 days whether Iran would reach a deal to avoid military action over its nuclear program.

title: After Obama says they're real, Trump orders release of government files on UFOs
shortDescription: "He gave classified information, he's not supposed to be doing that," Trump told reporters Feb. 19 in discussing Obama's comments on aliens.

title: Trump calls Andrew arrest a 'shame'
shortDescription: When asked about Andrew Mountbatten-Windsor's arrest, President Donald Trump called it a "shame."

title: Trump says he ended 8 wars at Board of Peace meeting. Which ones?
shortDescription: President Donald trump said at the Board of Peace he solved eight wars in his first year in office. What wars is he referring to? It doesn't equal 8.
